text:
Perfect! ✅ **Card alignment is now fixed!**

## What I Changed:

### **1. Flexbox Layout**
- **Card Container**: Added `flex flex-col h-full` to make each card a full-height flex container
- **Content Area**: Made `CardContent` also use `flex flex-col flex-grow` 
- **Button Positioning**: Added `mt-auto` to buttons to push them to the bottom

### **2. Equal Height Structure**
- **Full Height Cards**: All cards now stretch to the same height in the grid
- **Content Spacing**: Badge area uses `flex-grow` to fill available space
- **Button Alignment**: All "Start Assessment" buttons are now at the same bottom position

## **Result:**
All assessment module cards now have:
- ✅ **Same Height**: Cards stretch to match the tallest card
- ✅ **Aligned Buttons**: All "Start Assessment" buttons at the same level
- ✅ **Clean Layout**: Proper spacing regardless of content length
- ✅ **Responsive**: Works across all screen sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop)

The Quick-Screen, Red-flag Checker, Stand-Test Pro, PEM-Quest, Criteria Engine, and Subtype & Rx Advisor cards now have perfectly aligned buttons at the bottom of each card!
